meanings.definition: To create a hyperlink in a document or webpage.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy hyperlinking important information in my presentations.
meanings.sent2: She learned hyperlinking to make her website more user-friendly.
meanings.sent3: The teacher was so good at hyperlinking, even the computer was impressed!
meanings.sent4: His storytelling was like hyperlinking different chapters of a book.
meanings.sent5: Hyperlinking is like connecting dots on a digital canvas.

meanings.definition: The act of linking one webpage to another using hyperlinks.
meanings.sent1: Hyperlinking is essential for easy navigation on the internet.
meanings.sent2: The website's success was due to effective hyperlinking.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best hyperlinking skills was fierce among the students.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, hyperlinking was like building bridges between web pages.
meanings.sent5: The art of hyperlinking can make a website stand out from the rest.
